Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections from gastrointestinal/pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors
Purpose: Automated quantitative assessment of Ki-67 expression to obtain an accurate and reproducible proliferation index in gastrointestinal/pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors
Container: Positively charged glass slides with 4–5 µm tissue sections
Equipment: Automated IHC stainer (e.g., Ventana BenchMark XT or Leica BOND III) and microscope
